S234BE.DECK.  234. SURVEY NUMBER
S234BE.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S234BE.FORM.  1. FORM A - ENLISTED MEN 2. FORM A - OFFICERS 3. FORM B - ENLISTED MEN 4. FORM B - OFFICERS
S234BE.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. NON-COM (CORPORAL OR ANY GRADE OF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN) 4. SOME OTHER RANK OR GRADE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT GRADE?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20 TO 24 YEARS 3. 25 TO 29 YEARS 4. 30 TO 34 YEARS 5. 35 YEARS OR OLDER 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 6. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q6. IN WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIME?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE AND TANK DESTROYER 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT) 15. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q7. IN WHICH OF THE ARMY FORCES DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIME?  1. ARMY AIR FORCES 2. ARMY GROUND FORCES 3. ARMY SERVICE FORCES 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q8A. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q8B. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q9. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED AFTER PEARL HARBOR 3. I VOLUNTEERED BEFORE PEARL HARBOR 4. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 5. I WAS IN THE E.R.C. (ENLISTED RESERVE) 6. SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q10A. HAVE YOU SERVED OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES IN THIS WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q10B. IF YES, HOW LONG DID YOU SERVE OVERSEAS?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q10C. IF YES, HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR?  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11A AND 11B NOT CODED.
S234BE.Q12. HOW MANY POINTS TOWARD DISCHARGE DO YOU HAVE OFFICIALLY?  ANP 01. 1 POINT . . . 89. 89 POINTS 90.90-99 POINTS 91.100-119 POINTS 92.120 POINTS AND OVER 93.DON'T KNOW 00.NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q13. HAS THE ARMY AT ANY TIME CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MAN?  1. YES, I WAS CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 2. NO, I WAS NEVER CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 3. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS EVER CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q14A. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, ARE YOU NOW CLASSIFIED BY THE ARMY AS PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q14B. IN YOUR OWN OPINION, ARE YOU PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q15. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIME?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 16 NOT CODED.

S234BE.Q17. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. ON A FARM 2. IN THE COUNTRY BUT NOT ON A FARM 3. IN A VILLAGE WITH FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE 4. IN A SMALL CITY WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE 5. IN A CITY WITH BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE 6. IN A LARGE CITY WITH MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q18. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY? (CHECK AS MANY AS YOU WERE DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY.)  01. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER, FOR SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION 02. GOING TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 03. FARMING (EITHER WITH YOUR FAMILY OR FOR YOURSELF) 04. HAD MY OWN BUSINESS (DID NOT RECEIVE SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION) 05. LOOKING FOR A JOB 06. WORKING PART-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER 07. GOING TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 08. SOMETHING ELSE (EDITED TO LIST, NOT CONSIDERED ONE OF A DOUBLE CHECK) 09. I WAS IN THE REGULAR ARMY 10. DOUBLE CHECKS 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 19 NOT CODED.

S234BE.Q20. WHETHER YOU ARE A CHURCH MEMBER OR NOT, DO YOU CONSIDER YOURSELF:  1. CATHOLIC 2. JEWISH 3. PROTESTANT (FOR EXAMPLE, BAPTIST, METHODIST, ETC.) 4. OTHER (FOR EXAMPLE, MORMON, ORTHODOX, JEHOVAH'S WITNESSES, AGNOSTIC, ETC.) 0. NO ANSWER *****************************PART I***************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT THE ARMY DISCHARGE PLAN.

S234BE.Q21. IN GENERAL, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q22. IN YOUR OPINION, IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE?  1. YES, I THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 2. NO, I DON'T THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 3. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THE PLAN TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q23. HERE ARE FOUR STATEMENTS OF OPINION ABOUT THE POINT SYSTEM. CHECK THE ONE WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OPINION.  1. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 2. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 3. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 4. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q24. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW HARD IS THE ARMY TRYING TO SPEED UP THE DISCHARGE OF ENLISTED MEN?  1. THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. THE ARMY IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. THE ARMY IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q25. HAVE YOU HEARD OR READ ANYTHING ABOUT THE POSSIBILITY OF THE FOLLOWING CHANGE BEING MADE IN THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN - ALL ENLISTED MEN WITH TWO YEARS OR MORE SERVICE TO BE DISCHARGED IN THE NEAR FUTURE, REGARDLESS OF HOW MANY POINTS THEY HAVE?  1. YES, I HAVE HEARD OF THIS 2. NO, I HAVE NOT HEARD OF THIS BEFORE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q26. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, DOES THE ARMY AIR FORCES HAVE EXACTLY THE SAME DISCHARGE PLAN AS THE GROUND AND SERVICE FORCES?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S234BE.Q27. IN THE FUTURE, DO YOU THINK EVERY ABLE-BODIED YOUNG MAN SHOULD BE REQUIRED TO TAKE MILITARY OR NAVAL TRAINING FOR ONE YEAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO OPINION 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA ****************************PART II***************************** P. THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE BY DIFFERENT SOLDIERS ABOUT THE ARMY: READ EACH STATEMENT CAREFULLY. YOU WILL FIND THAT YOU AGREE WITH SOME AND DISAGREE WITH OTHERS. IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU AGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORD "AGREE". IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU DISAGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORD "DISAGREE". THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. THE ONLY ANSWER TO GIVE IS YOUR OWN HONEST OPINION.
S234BE.Q1. "TOO MANY ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS ARE UNNECESSARY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q2. "PROMOTION IN THE ARMY IS BASED ON WHO YOU KNOW AND NOT WHAT YOU KNOW*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q3. "IT IS WRONG FOR A SOLDIER TO ,GOLDBRICK, IF IT MAKES MORE WORK FOR THE REST OF THE MEN*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q4. "THE LONGER A MAN STAYS IN THE FIGHTING, THE BETTER HE BECOMES AS A COMBAT SOLDIER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q5. "IT IS ALL RIGHT FOR A SOLDIER TO BREAK ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS IF HE DOESN'T GET CAUGHT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q6. "ON THE WHOLE, I THINK THE ARMY HAS HELPED ME MORE THAN IT HAS HURT ME*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BE.Q7. "THE AIR FORCE HAS RECEIVED TOO GREAT A SHARE OF CREDIT FROM THE PUBLIC*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q22. "THE ARMY IS NOT TOO UNDEMOCRATIC*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BE.Q88. "IN THE ARMY IT'S BEST TO DO YOUR JOB THE WAY YOU'RE TOLD, EVEN IF YOU KNOW THERE IS A BETTER WAY TO DO IT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER *****************************PART III*************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT SEVERAL DIFFERENT TOPICS:

S234BE.Q1. IN GENERAL, HOW DO YOU THINK MOST NON-COMS TEND TO LOOK AT THINGS - FROM THE OFFICER'S POINT OF VIEW OR THE ENLISTED MAN'S POINT OF VIEW?  1. FROM THE OFFICER'S POINT OF VIEW 2. FROM THE ENLISTED MAN'S POINT OF VIEW 0. NO ANSWER
